name: part_003
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】3rd Anniversary LIVE Shine more!!! 【#さくらみこ３周年LIVE】 [cBQ2UD4LusU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Sakura Miko and Inugami Korone welcome the audience.
Performance of the song 'Waraou' with a Rakugo-style introduction.
MC section where Miko and Korone celebrate their first 3D performance together as 'Miccorone'.
Oozora Subaru joins the stage for a talk session and a photo shoot.
The trio takes photos with the audience and poses for the camera.

subtitles.original: 皆様、今日はようこそおいでいただきました。
subtitles.english: Welcome, everyone, and thank you for coming today.

subtitles.original: ここで一席！！
subtitles.english: And now, a performance!!

subtitles.original: ねずみの娘がお嫁に行って、じきに帰ってきたんで、
subtitles.english: A mouse's daughter got married and came home soon after,

subtitles.original: ねずみのおかあさんが、大変怒って、
subtitles.english: so the mouse mother was very angry,

subtitles.original: 「あんな、いいところへ、おまえ嫁いで、
subtitles.english: "You married into such a good place,

subtitles.original: 誰が嫌で、出てきたんだい？」
subtitles.english: who did you dislike so much that you left?"

subtitles.original: 「いいえ、だーれも嫌じゃないんですけれど、
subtitles.english: "No, I didn't dislike anyone, but

subtitles.original: ご隠居さんがやさしいんで、嫌なの。」
subtitles.english: the retired master was so kind that I disliked it."

subtitles.original: 「やさしいんなら結構じゃあないかえ。」
subtitles.english: "If he's kind, isn't that wonderful?"

subtitles.original: 「でも、ねこなで声ですもの。」
subtitles.english: "But, he speaks in a cat-like voice."

subtitles.original: ニャー！
subtitles.english: Meow!

subtitles.original: 忙しさに身を任せて
subtitles.english: Giving myself over to the busyness

subtitles.original: 消えていくなんて べらんめえ！
subtitles.english: Vanishing away? Nonsense!

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう 笑えなくても
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, even if we can't

subtitles.original: 笑うしかないでしょ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: We have to laugh, so let's laugh

subtitles.original: もう（ソイヤ ソイヤ）
subtitles.english: Come on now (Soiya soiya)

subtitles.original: 口上げて ひたむきに笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Open your mouth and laugh wholeheartedly

subtitles.original: お見事 大盛況さぁ
subtitles.english: Splendid, a great success

subtitles.original: クリアして 現代 日本人 笑おう
subtitles.english: Getting through it, modern Japanese, let's laugh

subtitles.original: 未来永劫 グハハと笑いましょう
subtitles.english: For all eternity, let's laugh out loud

subtitles.original: 小娘のたわごと と切り捨てないで
subtitles.english: Don't dismiss it as a young girl's nonsense

subtitles.original: しかめつら なんか変な顔
subtitles.english: Frowning is such a strange face

subtitles.original: 笑顔を見たいから
subtitles.english: I want to see your smile

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう さぁ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, come on, let's laugh

subtitles.original: こんな時代こそ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Especially in times like these, let's laugh

subtitles.original: 笑おう（ソイヤ ソイヤ）
subtitles.english: Let's laugh (Soiya soiya)

subtitles.original: 泣いたら負け やけくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: If you cry, you lose, let's laugh desperately

subtitles.original: 腹八分 粋も甘いも
subtitles.english: Eighty percent full, both refined and sweet

subtitles.original: 乗り越えた あっぱれ 日本人 笑おう
subtitles.english: We overcame it, bravo Japanese, let's laugh

subtitles.original: どんな時でも なにくそ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: No matter when, let's laugh with determination

subtitles.original: ひたすら 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh earnestly

subtitles.original: ぐはっはっは（ぐはっはっは）
subtitles.english: Guhahaha (Guhahaha)

subtitles.original: にょほほ（にょほほ） 勇気なんてよも末に笑い飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Nyohoho (Nyohoho) Laugh away your courage at the end

subtitles.original: 笑顔（笑顔） 笑顔（笑顔）
subtitles.english: Smile (Smile), Smile (Smile)

subtitles.original: 笑う門には福来る！
subtitles.english: Fortune comes to those who smile!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでー！
subtitles.english: Yes, and so!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ころさーん！
subtitles.english: Yay! Koro-san!

subtitles.original: ころさん、おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Koro-san, congratulations!

subtitles.original: すごい！一緒に歌えてすごい嬉しい！あ、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Amazing! I'm so happy we could sing together! Oh, thank you.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ！みっころねで、3Dで。
subtitles.english: That's right! Miccorone, in 3D.

subtitles.original: 初めてなの！
subtitles.english: It's the first time!

subtitles.original: そうなんです、イェーイ！
subtitles.english: That's right, yay!

subtitles.original: みっころね初3D！
subtitles.english: Miccorone's first 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、来てくれて。もうすごい嬉しい。駆けつけちゃった。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming. I'm so happy. I just rushed here.

subtitles.original: ね、この曲ね、みっころねっぽいかなと思って選ばせてもらったんだ。
subtitles.english: You know, I chose this song because I thought it was very Miccorone-like.

subtitles.original: ころねもこの曲大好きで！
subtitles.english: Korone also loves this song!

subtitles.original: そう、みこみこと一緒に歌いたいなと思ってたから、今回歌えて嬉しかった！
subtitles.english: Yes, I wanted to sing it with Mikomiko, so I was really happy to sing it!

subtitles.original: やったー！みこもね、この曲はね、ころねの歌枠で知ったんだよ。
subtitles.english: Yay! Miko too, I found out about this song through Korone's singing stream.

subtitles.original: え、そうなの！？
subtitles.english: Oh, really!?

subtitles.original: そうなの！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yay!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm happy!

subtitles.original: ということで、今回、もう一人呼びたいかなって思います。
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to call one more person this time.

subtitles.original: スバルー！
subtitles.english: Subaru!

subtitles.original: いる？
subtitles.english: Are you here?

subtitles.original: こえーよ！
subtitles.english: You're scary!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 確かに初めてだもんね、このメンツ。
subtitles.english: It certainly is the first time for this group.

subtitles.original: なんでスバルみっころねのところに呼んでもらえたんだ、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Why was Subaru called to join Miccorone? I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: スバ、スバ、スバ！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Suba, suba, suba! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: せっかくだから、ちょっと撮影をしたいなと思うんですけどいいですか？
subtitles.english: Since we're here, I'd like to take some photos, is that okay?

subtitles.original: やったー！やりたいやりたい。
subtitles.english: Yay! I want to, I want to.

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと3人で。みこ真ん中でいい？
subtitles.english: Then, the three of us. Miko, is it okay if you're in the middle?

subtitles.original: 真ん中はもちろん、もちろん！
subtitles.english: The middle? Of course, of course!

subtitles.original: どんなポーズがいいの？
subtitles.english: What kind of pose should we do?

subtitles.original: なんかさ、カメラ寄ってもらって。あ、いいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Let's have the camera move closer. Oh, that's good!

subtitles.original: おにゃー！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Onyaa! Yay!

subtitles.original: すぐ殴るじゃん！カツアゲですよカツアゲ。やべーわ。
subtitles.english: You start punching right away! This is extortion. This is bad.

subtitles.original: はい、会場のみんなとも撮りたいなと思って！
subtitles.english: Yes, I also want to take photos with everyone in the venue!

subtitles.original: あっちあっち！カメラ回ってもらって。
subtitles.english: That way! Have the camera turn around.

subtitles.original: すげー！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: え、しゃがんで撮る？座って撮るやつ、よくあるやつ。
subtitles.english: Should we crouch and take it? The sitting one, the usual kind.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: わーエモいなー。嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Wow, that's emotional. I'm happy!

subtitles.original: めっちゃいい。ライブだライブ！
subtitles.english: So good. It's a live concert!

subtitles.original: ピースピース！
subtitles.english: Peace, peace!

subtitles.original: 商売商売商売商売。
subtitles.english: Business business business business.

subtitles.original: たいやきたいやきたいやきたいやき。
subtitles.english: Taiyaki taiyaki taiyaki taiyaki.

subtitles.original: あと何ある？
subtitles.english: What else is there?

subtitles.original: えーどうしようかな。じゃあスバちゃんと、ハートマーク作ろうかな。
subtitles.english: Hmm, what to do. Then, I'll make a heart mark with Suba-chan.
